title: What’s The Plan? Plus: Trying To Understand the Saints Salary Cap Situation
description:
Yahoo Sports’ Charles Robinson joins Kevin and Nora to discuss some of the major themes so far in free agency (2:16). Then Kevin and Nora talk about the first day of the legal tampering period and discuss what several teams' plans are moving forward (23:52). Lastly, Nick Underhill from New Orleans.Football joins the show to explain how the Saints have managed their salary cap situation over the years (1:05:55).
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guests: Charles Robinson and Nick Underhill
